name: Budding Seeds
description: Summon a field of flowers which blooms after 6 seconds, healing you and allies in the area for 3485 Health.  While the field grows, you and allies are healed for 398 Health every 1 second.    You can activate this ability again to cause it to instantly bloom.  An ally within the field can activate the Harvest synergy, healing for 3372 Health over 5 seconds.
effectLines: The area now heals allies while it grows, and can be activated a second time to instantly trigger the delayed heal.
coefDescription: Summon a field of flowers which blooms after 6 seconds, healing you and allies in the area for $1 Health.  While the field grows, you and allies are healed for $2 Health every 1 second.    You can activate this ability again to cause it to instantly bloom.  An ally within the field can activate the Harvest synergy, healing for $3 Health over 5 seconds.
